amendment.description: An amendment numbered 30 printed House Report 119-232 to reduce funding for the Southeast Crescent Regional Commission and transfer to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 307 (Roll no. 234).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 307 (Roll no. 234).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
